page.title: 09Village Amenities.
page.content: {1 The village Hall.} In Castle Camps this is used for discos, dances, wedding anniversaries, meetings, jumble, sales, auctions, baby club(how much you weigh,) play group and lots of raffles. {2 The Men's Club.} This little Hall is used by the Youth club each week.It is a rather small insignificant building. {3 The old School House.} Next door to the school, this has recently been sold.It is an attractive victorian house. {4 An old Pub.} Next to the Old School House is a fine house, once a Pub. It has three stories, is made of brick, flint and tiles and was built in 1698.
